about_the_game:
Additional content and an artbook viewer for fans of Without a Voice!

Features:

  • Four new epilogue short stories following two good and two bad endings of the base game
  • Two new illustrations for the good ending epilogues
  • A built-in artbook viewer from the game itself
  • Digital PDF of the artbook included in game files

    Artbook:

  • A quick, spoiler-free guide to all the endings as well as explanations for them!
  • All the artwork from the game!
  • Concept art and work-in-progress shots!
  • Lots and lots of developer commentary!
  • A ton of extra art Laniessa, the game's artist, has made over the last few years!


    The artbook PDF can be found in the game folder, which can be accessed by browsing local files!

content_descriptors.notes: As this artbook contains every CG from the game, please be warned that some CGs contain blood/violence.
